ntlyricsDescription: began as a humble Facebook page — created out of necessity to help beginner musicians navigate the often messy world of Burmese music chords. Back in the early days, finding accurate chords and lyrics for local songs was more about guesswork than guidance. That frustration gave birth to this project. What started as a few shared posts quickly gained traction. Musicians, singers, and hobbyists began using and contributing, turning the page into a quiet but growing hub. Today, NT Lyric n Chord is a dedicated space — built not just to host lyrics and chords, but to make playing and learning music feel accessible for everyone. We’re not a corporation, and we’re not some faceless aggregator. This project is run by people who play music too.

collectionsexplained.title: Collections
collectionsexplained.description: Collections are like your own albums for lyrics. You can group your favorite lyrics into categories you love.
collectionsexplained.limitInfo: You can create up to 20 collections, each holding up to 20 lyrics.
collectionsexplained.defaultInfo: Your Default Collection is unlimited, so you can always save more lyrics there.
collectionsexplained.benefit: Collections make it easy to keep your favorite lyrics organized in a way that feels personal to you.

themesexplained.title: Themes
themesexplained.description: Themes let you personalize the look and feel of the app to match your style.
themesexplained.lightDark: You can switch between Light and Dark modes anytime.
themesexplained.custom: More custom color themes are coming soon, so you can make the app truly yours.
